summary: Marzak is a Nord who found his way into Whitrun and has been staying at the Inn. He will be quick to follow you, and is a great companion to have at your side!
descriptionHtml:
This is my first of many different follower mods, hopefully I will get several out per week. 
THIS DOES NOT REQUIRE DAWNGUARD
This mod adds a new companion to the game, Marzak. He can be found in near the skyforge in whiterun. He is a lightly armored, heavily equipped warrior. 
Please endorse me if you like it!

Marzak is a true nord who grew up in Windhelm, raised by his father, Darzak. He lived a warriors life, slaying bandits and trolls for Windhelm as head of the guard with his fathers Ebony sword. He was sadly kicked from windhelm when ulfric took power, Ulfric claimed he had stolen from him. Marzak wandered to and fro from city to city looking for a man worthy of his skills. Finally you have come along.
author: MarzakGaming
